If so, enter in the name

List any known food allergies you have; say none if you have none
Enter details of your diet plan, if you have one; say "none" if you do not
Breakfast: Cereal Bar.\nLunch: Rice, yogurt, pulverized tomato extract.
Trying to eat less fat and more food that helps build strength

Since you calorie intake so far today is between 500 and 750, we recommend that you eat some type of vegetable dish. Maybe eat some eggplant since it will help you develop strength and has a lot of nutrients that you need.
Ingredients: 1 cup flour, 1/2 tsp carom seeds, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper powder, and a pinch of asafoetida, 5mm raw eggplant slices\n

Process: Mix the dry ingredients (everything besides the eggplant pieces) well. Add cold water and make sure no lumps are formed. The batter should have the same consistency as pancake batter. Dip the eggplant pieces into the batter and deep fry in hot oil. Reduce the heat after the eggplant pieces are dropped in oil and fry until they are a beige-ish color. Then remove them and place them on a paper towel to drain excess oil. You can eat them plain, or with ketchup or pulverized cilantro.
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

string-array.name: goals_array
string-array.item: Fitness
Food
Fun

string-array.name: chest_workout_array
string-array.item: 1. Find a chair and face it forward.
2. Standing backwards, place your hands on the seat of the chair.
3. Go down till your elbows are roughly 90 degrees to the chair.
4. Push yourself up. Repeat this process till you need rest.

string-array.name: tricep_workout_array
string-array.item: 1. Lay flat on the floor.
2. Place your hands in front of you at shoulder width.
3. Push up while keeping you body parallel to the ground.
4. Go down till your elbows are roughly 90 degrees to the ground.
5. Continue to repeat this process till you need rest.

string-array.name: abs_workout_array
string-array.item: 1. Lie on your back with you knees bent and your legs flat on the floor.
2. Place your hands behind your head.
3. Exhale and curl forward till your head, shoulder and neck come off the floor.
4. Hold yourself for 5 seconds and then come down.
5. Repeat this process till you need rest.

string-array.name: shoulder_workout_array
string-array.item: 1. Find a stick or a pole that is roughly 4-5 feet long.
2. Stand with your back straight.
3. Hold the pole above your head, about shoulder width.
4. Extend your arms above your head till your arms are straight.
5. Bring your arms back down till your arms are about 90 degrees.
6. Repeat this process till you need rest.

string-array.name: quads_workout_array
string-array.item: 1. Begin in a standing position.
2. Kick back into the push-up position.
3. Lower your body and perform a push-up.
4. Upon coming up, return back into the original standing position.
5. Jump into the air and throw your arms into the air.
6. Repeat this process till you need rest.
